mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_TRADE(USER_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, TRADE_TYPE, ACCEPT_MONTH, TRADE_NAME, TRADE_ICON, TRADE_AMOUNT, REMARK, TRADE_TIME, IS_RE_TRADE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{accountId}, #{tradeType}, #{acceptMonth}, #{tradeName}, #{tradeIcon}, #{tradeAmount}, #{remark}, #{tradeTime}, #{isReTrade});
